Text: Thanks!!  You sure upload nice books!

Thanks Mantesh for the ebook.
But, PIRATE BAY... these !@#$%^ popups are insanely annoying!!!!!!!!  Can't do anything on a PB page without making one of the @#$% things appear! Twice while typing the last sentence one popped up, unbelievably fucking annoying!!!
Thanks @MANTESH. Seems you are now overtaking @MALESTROM's throne as the royal master of e-book uploaders.
